title: DOOR Syndrome: Clinical Overview and Case Reports
short_description: Clinical documentation of DOOR syndrome, a rare genetic disorder affecting approximately 50 reported cases with equal male-female distribution.
long_description: This clinical research document provides information about DOOR syndrome, a rare genetic condition that has been documented in approximately 50 cases in the medical literature. The document notes that the syndrome affects males and females equally, indicating no sex-linked inheritance pattern. DOOR syndrome is characterized by its rarity and the limited number of documented cases, making it an important subject for clinical research and case study documentation.
